Name: Noodles with basil
Description: Authenicate Thai noodle dish with different levels of spice depending on birds' eye chilis amounts. This goes well with a simple stir-fry like bak choi greens

Ingredients.Name: birds' eye chilis, halved and de-seeded

Instructions.Instruction: Heat oil in a wok and fry the chilis for half a minute; this make them less fiery
Add the noodles, throughly drained if they were placed in hot water, and fry for another minute or so. Add the sesame oil and 2 tablespoons of the basil
Combine well, add the yellow bean sauce and soy mixture and stir fry for about 1 minute, until it looks done.
Heat a little more oil in the wok and fry the remaining basil which will go crispy in seconds. Sprinkle this over the top of the noodles.
